wpPage.title: Who we are
wpPage.content:
We are world turners. Experts at sourcing, storing and shipping, our greater role is to keep our customers’ worlds turning effortlessly with seamless supply chain solutions.

Each of our projects pose unique challenges in ever-changing environments which is why we excel at providing bespoke solutions that understand the unique needs of our customers.

We are a lean, passionate and powerful team of hand-picked professionals, who listen closely to craft and deliver out-of-the-box solutions to the most challenging logistics across any supply chain. Big or small. From A to Z.

Beyond scale, geography and industry, our FLS DNA clearly defines the way we approach business: authentic personal engagements that build trust; a solutions-oriented mindset that achieves the highest quality results with upfront honesty and precision and guides us to always do what is right.

This is why our promise to the world is: Tailor-Made Global Solutions

WORLD MOVERS CORPORATE VIDEO

OUR MISSION

We keep the world moving, by deploying the best expertise to craft tailor-made solutions that solve the most challenging logistic problems all around the world.

OUR VISION

To be recognised globally as the logistics experts who understand and empower global business leaders to dream and act big; moving the world forward.

seo.title: Who we are - FLS
seo.metaDesc: FLS keeps the world moving, by deploying the best expertise to craft tailor-made solutions that solve the most challenging logistic problems.
seo.opengraphDescription: FLS keeps the world moving, by deploying the best expertise to craft tailor-made solutions that solve the most challenging logistic problems.

flsHistory.title: FLS HISTORY
flsHistory.description: We're extremely proud of how far we've come.

historyBlock.content:
The company was founded in Bangkok in May 1993 by Martin Häberli and was soon awarded several projects such as Thai Taffeta, Thainox Steel and Monsanto.
During the following years, FLS gained more experience by handling many projects in Thailand, namely:
· Sosuco Project / Saraburi
· Tunnel Drilling Machines B.C.K.T. JV / Bangkok
· Thai National Power CCPP, Electrowatt Engineering
· US Armed Forces Cobra Cold Military Exercise 2000, Thailand
· Laem Chabang and Amata Power Plants

FLS ventured more and more into handling export projects from steel fabricators in Thailand, Korea, China, Vietnam, Malaysia and Indonesia to global destinations for major engineering companies in the Power, Petrochemical and Mining industries.
In order to support our customers with even better service and faster communication, we expanded from Bangkok to our first small office in Laem Chabang in 2004.
In June of 2006, we finally moved all operations to our new office in the Talay Thong Tower in Laem Chabang, overlooking the harbour.
This strategic move allowed us to be closer to our customers, the authorities and the move towards the Thailand East coast and its settled manufacturers. That proved to be very successful because it allowed us to be even more “hands-on”.

In 2007, Torbjörn Larisch started leading the FLS team as Managing Director.

In 2011 FLS (Vietnam) Ltd. was established, followed by
· FLS (Australia) Pty Ltd. in 2013
· FLS (Singapore) Pte Ltd. in 2014
· PT. Federal Logistik Sistem (Indonesia) in 2014
· FLS Projects (USA) Inc. in 2016
· FLS Projects (Taiwan) Ltd. in 2016
· FLS Projects (Malaysia) Sdn. Bhd, in 2018

At the end of 2016, Torbjörn Larisch became our Chief Executive Officer.

historyBlock.title: 2020 - Now
historyBlock.content:
After almost three decades, we have expanded our services from project cargo into a wider portfolio to now include:
· FLS Logistics
· FLS Warehousing
· FLS Trading
We are ready for our next chapter: being a house of multi-disciplinary, interconnected, businesses that serve existing and new clients of diverse sizes, industries and locations.

snapshotSlider.title: $65 MILLION
snapshotSlider.description: IS THE LARGEST SINGLE CONTRACT AWARD

teamMember.name: Martin Häberli
teamMember.content: Martin has over 40 years of international freight forwarding experience, 21 of which were gained in Thailand. Prior to establishing FLS, he worked in the USA, Europe, South Africa and the Middle East. Project Forwarding is in his blood and he is proud to see FLS grow to become the top project forwarder in the region. He speaks English, French, German and Italian fluently.

teamMember.name: Torbjörn Larisch
teamMember.content: Torbjoern has more than 23 years experience in project freight forwarding and logistics out of which he spent 20 years working in South East Asia gaining valuable knowledge and experience in project handling. He speaks English and German fluently.

teamMember.name: Christopher Schnieders
teamMember.content: Christopher has been in the project forwarding industry for 19 years; out of which he has spent 16 years in Vietnam. He has built an extensive network in Vietnam through which the company provides outstanding services to its clients in Vietnam. Recently, Chris has taken on the important role of Chief Marketing Officer for the Group. He speaks German and English fluently with a good working knowledge of Vietnamese.

teamMember.name: Francesco Josè Rivi
teamMember.role: Global Head of Warehousing & Managing Director APAC
teamMember.content: Francesco has been in the logistics industry for over 20 years. Prior to joining FLS eight years ago he worked in various European countries including France, Spain, Romania, Poland and Italy. He speaks Italian, French, Spanish and English fluently.

teamMember.name: Sarawut Suwattanakorn
teamMember.content: Sarawut has more than 15 years of Project Cargo and Heavy Lift Cargo handling experience and has traveled all over the world for FLS. As a team leader he oversees the FLS team of Project Managers. Sarawut has been with FLS for over 14 years. He speaks Thai and English fluently. His excellent intercultural and communication skills are a great asset to FLS.

teamMember.name: Sven Hoehle
teamMember.content: Sven has more than 9 years experience in project freight forwarding and logistics. Prior to joining the FLS Team he spent 6 years working in Germany gaining valuable knowledge and experience in Ocean Freight, Freight Forwarding and Project Handling. He speaks English and German fluently.

teamMember.name: Florian Passut
teamMember.content: Florian 'Flo' Passut has recently joined the FLS Vietnam family as Country Manager. Flo brings nine years of logistics experience across Germany, Australia, Papua New Guinea and now Vietnam.

teamMember.name: Le Quoc Trung
teamMember.content: Trung Le is a seaman with over 10 years experience including two years as a captain, one and a half years as DPA / Safety and Legislation Manager for a shipping company. As well as being an experienced Marine Superintendent, he is also a Marine Surveyor, an Inspector and a ISM Auditor. As a Project Manager Trung Le has been with FLS in Vietnam for more than two years. During his time as a seaman - Trung Le has developed a wide network in ship building, contacts to shipping companies and fabricators in Vietnam. He speaks Vietnamese and English fluently.

teamMember.name: Johannes Linnenbruegger
teamMember.content: As a project freight forwarding and logistics professional, Johannes, or "Hansi," brings a wealth of experience to FLS Projects Vietnam. Prior to joining FLS, Hansi gained valuable insights in Germany and contributed to diverse project sites worldwide. Apart from that, he is working on supporting IT solutions, making him a versatile asset to any project team. He speaks English and German fluently.

teamMember.name: Nguyen Ho Thuy Vi
teamMember.content: Vi had paid the role of Specialist for Dry Bulk Shipping Operations for an American shipping company. With more than 5 years experience of in operational management of both vessel and cargo for trade lanes from Southeast Asia to America, Europe, and Oceania, and vice versa, Vi enhances her knowledge and ability to deliver efficient work. She aims to contribute to the Team’s achievement by cultivating more operational profit and extending excellent customer care.

teamMember.name: Nguyen Cao Khuong
teamMember.content: Khuong Nguyen has more than 6 years experience in freight forwarding and logistics. With different positions she worked at international forwarders prior to joining the FLS Team, she gained valuable knowledge and experience in Ocean Freight, Freight Forwarding.

teamMember.name: Nguyen Trong Khoa
teamMember.content: Khoa has been in Logistics industry for 10 years. His commitment is to provide exceptional logistics service and comprehensive solutions tailored to our clients. Now, Khoa has taken on building our local client base in Viet Nam and Oversea in line with our sales strategy.

teamMember.name: Nguyen Gia My
teamMember.content: My has been in the Logistics industry for 4 years. She is dedicated to providing exceptional customer care and collaborates closely with vendors and relevant stakeholders to monitor and report shipment progress, ensuring the best solutions for our customers' requirements.

teamMember.name: Nguyen Bich Phuong
teamMember.content: Phuong has worked for various international and local companies in Vietnam actively gaining experience in industries like logistics, feed, construction, and trading since 2005. During her career, she equally worked in the sales & marketing and procurement sector. In FLS Trading, she and her team will find customers, source suppliers and factories, manage orders, take care of customers, and provide inspection and quality control services.

teamMember.name: Stephen Scott
teamMember.content: Stephen Scott is our Managing Director in Australia. Stephen has 28 years industry experience in all aspect of logistics from warehousing, general freight, OOG and project logistics, specialising in customs trade and tariff consultancy services. Besides that, Stephen is a Licensed Quarantine Accredited Customs Broker since 1997 and has a Diploma of Business Management.

teamMember.name: James Muruthi
teamMember.content: James looks after FLS Singapore and has a keen eye on growing the company’s business in Malaysia and Indonesia. Prior to joining the FLS Team he worked in Oil and Gas Investment Banking where he gained sector-specific knowledge and built his network. He hails from Singapore and speaks English fluently.

flsCommunityWork.title: COMMUNITY WORK
flsCommunityWork.description: We are committed to ethically and consciously contribute to the economic and social development of the countries in which we operate. Our aim is to improve the quality of life of our employees and their families as well as the local community and society at large.

communityWorkItem.title: The Diamond Elephant Foundation
communityWorkItem.description: As proud Founders and Sponsors, our mission is to provide much needed help, hope and opportunities to abused, neglected, sick and orphaned children across Thailand. We gather donations that will offer education, scholarship opportunities and improved school and housing infrastructures to guarantee a better quality of life. To learn more or contribute to our Foundation, please visit www.diamondelephant.org

corporateGovernanceSection.title: Corporate Governance
corporateGovernanceSection.description: At FLS Group, we are dedicated to maintaining the highest standards of corporate governance, ensuring our operations are conducted with transparency, integrity, and accountability. Our comprehensive governance framework reflects our commitment to ethical business practices and sustainable growth, benefiting our employees, their families, and the broader community.

flsSponsorship.title: SPONSORSHIPS
flsSponsorship.description: We are delighted to help others pursue their passions through sponsorships that enrich the lives our partners and our team. Here are some recent highlights.

contentPicker.excerpt: Last weekend, we took to the seas again. This time as proud co-sponsor of the Platu Championship of Thailand yacht race. As the experts in moving yachts around the world, we were delighted when our very own FLS sailing team delivered a worthy result amongst tough competition in Round 1. Further events are coming and… Continue reading Co-sponsor of the Platu Championship of Thailand yacht race
contentPicker.title: Co-sponsor of the Platu Championship of Thailand yacht race

contentPicker.excerpt: We are taking on bigger challenges in the supply chain world and with our sponsored racing team, building on our successful 2021 GTU E46 race series together with Rohde & Liesenfeld and driver Stefan Rzadzinski. This November 2021, the team entered an LMP3 car into the Motul Petite Le Mans, which is one of the… Continue reading Sponsoring Speed at the Motul Petite Le Mans
contentPicker.title: Sponsoring Speed at the Motul Petite Le Mans
